title: The Press
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and blue, gray and tan washes over graphite
description: A man shown almost front face holding in front of him an open newspaper marked "La Presse." He wears a blue coat or smock, black trousers, and on his head a hat formed of tiers of newspapers. Inscried in graphite: "Demandez La prrrresse, la Patrrrrie."
name: Drawing
